channel.title: Error when trying to run the .bat file
channel.description:

Any help please? It is richscape V2 by the way, And I have JDK 1.6.0_07

item.title: Error when trying to run the .bat file
item.dc:creator: @Robban1 Robban1
item.description:
@Robban1 wrote:

search for: JDK 1.6.0_5 in the runserver. and edit the java you have tex i have jdg 10.6.0_5[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 15, 2008, 07:39:05 am[/size][hr]and can someone say me what i should pur into a runserver?

item.title: Error when trying to run the .bat file
item.dc:creator: @kojomba kojomba
item.description:
@kojomba wrote:

try this
right click on runserver(edit)
remove everthing what you see
and add there

@echo off title ~Kojomba~ java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
